subtitle: Marinated and caramelised citrus fruits... The perfect dessert after a big meal.

method.text: Make sure the orange and grapefruit segments have no pith on them. Place in a bowl with the Cointreau and cinnamon. Toss to mix well. Cover and leave to macerate, ideally overnight.
Melt the butter in a large frying pan. Add the fruit segments and any remaining macerating liquid. Heat through gently for 3-5 min or until piping hot. Sprinkle over the Demerara sugar.
Grill gently for 3-5 min or until sugar has caramelised.

title: Cinnamon sunrise special
